sermons.title: K-488 The Eternal Perspective (1 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from the book of Hebrews, Art emphasizes that believers are characterized by a future hope that has implications for their lifestyles in the present.  A 1994 message.

sermons.title: K-489 The Eternal Perspective (2 of 2)
sermons.description: Speaking from the book of Hebrews, Art emphasizes that believers are characterized by a future hope that has implications for their lifestyles in the present.  A 1994 message.
